short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate placeholder images with specific dimensions as temporary solutions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you're developing a website, you will want to have an image with certain dimensions to be in a certain place as a temporary solution while you are still developing. We do this, but with cat pictures!

Just open our extension, enter the dimensions, choose if to be black and white, and just copy the link then insert into your site!
